title: Docker Testcontainers Now Available on Red Hat's OpenShift
author: B Cameron Gain
description: Testcontainers offer developers a way past their otherwise often isolated developer environment.
cntitle: Docker Testcontainers 现已在 Red Hat 的 OpenShift 上推出
cndescription: Testcontainers 为开发者提供了一种方法，让他们可以超越通常孤立的开发者环境。
